Detailed Description

CalendarCache stores some settings for calendar including the current time zone for the instances.

These settings are stored using a key/value scheme. A KEY must be specified when updating these values. Do not Insert new value via app directly.

Definition at line 503 of file CalendarInfos.h.

Member Function Documentation

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Cache::KEY ( ) [static]

The key for the setting.

Column name.

Type: TEXT

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Cache::KEY_TIMEZONE_INSTANCES ( ) [static]

The key for updating the time zone used by the provider when it generates the instances table.

This should only be written if the type is set to Cache#TIMEZONE_TYPE_HOME. A valid time zone id should be written to this field.

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Cache::KEY_TIMEZONE_INSTANCES_PREVIOUS ( ) [static]

The key for reading the last time zone set by the user.

This should only be read by apps and it will be automatically updated whenever Cache#KEY_TIMEZONE_INSTANCES is updated with Cache#TIMEZONE_TYPE_HOME set.

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Cache::KEY_TIMEZONE_TYPE ( ) [static]

They key for updating the use of auto/home time zones in Calendar.

Valid values are Cache#TIMEZONE_TYPE_AUTO or Cache#TIMEZONE_TYPE_HOME.

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Cache::TIMEZONE_TYPE_AUTO ( ) [static]

The value to write to Cache#KEY_TIMEZONE_TYPE if the provider should stay in sync with the device's time zone.

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarInfos::Cache::TIMEZONE_TYPE_HOME ( ) [static]

The value to write to Cache#KEY_TIMEZONE_TYPE if the provider should use a fixed time zone set by the user.

The value of the given setting.

Column name.
